channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Claim Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Claim Plugin

item.title: CVE-2021-21620|2024-08-03T18:16:23.760Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20claim%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Claim Plugin 2.18.1 and earlier allows attackers to change claims.

item.title: CVE-2021-21619|2024-08-03T18:16:23.683Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20claim%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Claim Plugin 2.18.1 and earlier does not escape the user display name, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers who are able to control the display names of Jenkins users, either via the security realm, or directly inside Jenkins.
